data.name: Life on the hook
data.detailed_description:
Check out more

https://store.steampowered.com/app/912000/Mike_goes_on_hike


Check out more

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1521250/Offroad_Delivery_Service/


About the Game

Life on the hook - is a short story about the cycle of life in which you, as a fisherman named Hrafn, begin your journey remembering the old days.

Immerse yourself in the short story of the life of a lonely fisherman named Hrafn, based on exploration and searching for items. Relax and enjoy the story of the game, where you'll get nothing but peace!

Feature of game:

- A small game for 30 minutes
- Good soundtrack
- Soulful story of a man's life
- A glimpse from the outside: how many moments in life a person misses by the eye and only in old age does he reflect on the past.

CHECK OUT MORE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/912000
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1521250

data.short_description: Life on the Hook - is a short story about the life of a lonely fisherman named Hrafn, who lives his life in a small house on a lake with a dock and an old boat.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i3-7100U and Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 285 / Nvidia geforce gtx 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 and AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia geforce gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
